my adopted dad works at hp.

content.text: I love to go for long runs and I'm really excited to see my girlfriend after I'm done with one today.
That's cool! I do not like to go to the gym, so I try to get my exercise by fishing or walking.
I love fishing too! I'm from Texas. Do you fly airplanes? My dad works at HP and my girlfriend is a flight attendant.
That's awesome! I do fly airplanes. I love the Red Hot Chili Peppers. What's your favorite band?
My favorite band is the Killers. I love their music and they put on a great live show.
I've heard of them. I'll have to check them out. It sounds like we have a lot in common!
Yeah, we do! I'm sure we'd be great friends.
I'd love to get to know you better. Would you like to hang out sometime?
